title: Privacy Vault UI

detailed_design.description: Add UI indicator and basic management for local-only sensitive data (Privacy Vault). README mentions 'Privacy Vault: Traps sensitive/NSFW/Personal data locally' but no UI exists.
detailed_design.solution: 1. Add subtle status bar or Settings indicator for vault status. 2. Optional: basic vault summary (items count, last used). 3. Connect to memory/vault backend when available.

acceptance_criteria: Subtle indicator when data is in local vault
No sensitive data exposed in UI
Connected to vault backend when implemented

user_stories.story: As a security-conscious user, I want to know when sensitive data is kept local.
As a user, I want reassurance that my private data stays on my hardware.
